actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: Resolution recognizing and commending the Lackawanna County Monument Fund Committee.

summary.text: Expresses the sense of the House of Representatives that the Lackawanna County Monument Fund Committee officers and fund raising committee be commended for their effort in completing such Monument.

titles.title: Resolution recognizing and commending the Lackawanna County Monument Fund Committee.
